Description: Full-flavored with a balance of malty sweetness contrasted by hop spiciness and a smooth finish
An imperial IPA best savored from a snifter
ABV: 90 Minute has a great malt backbone that stands up to the extreme hopping rate.

Size: not-quite pale ale. #9 is really impossible to describe because there's never been anything else quite like it

Description: The best of the worst standard party lagers on the market.
Your girlfriend tells you she loves this beer.
It’s the first brown ale you claimed to like. It’s ok
ABV: but a little too sweet for a beer that isn't' a double or triple.
